>
[Resilient Shell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2934) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 72 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon is resilient against attacks. It gains resistance to physical damage equal to its Constitution modifier.
name: Resilient Shell
